sitename: Radiant Healing Arts Center - Joseph Sciabbarrasi M.D.
cleaned_text: As we finished putting together our top 10 list of Radiant Health posts for 2020, it was no surprise to see that nearly half had a clear COVID connection. Some looked at nutrients with therapeutic potential against the virus, while others looked more broadly at supporting immune health or simply answered the questions we were hearing most often as the scope of the pandemic was becoming clear. Also popular were posts on natural therapies such as herbal medicine, high-dose vitamin C, and ozone for conditions such as Lyme and herpes (zoster and simplex alike). Other top posts looked at the impact of things like exercise and diet on longevity in general, as well as some of the most common dental conditions that can affect whole body health. Still, there's a common thread connecting all of these topics: An exploration of the new and emerging scientific research that supports the kind of integrated approach to health and well-being that we take here at the Radiant Healing Arts Center. Science is the foundation. So before getting too much further into 2021, let's take one last look back at what people like you were viewing most through the year just past: [Some Investigations into Vitamin C & COVID-19](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/supplements-remedies/some-investigations-into-vitamin-c-covid-19/) Vitamin C is one nutrient that has received special attention as a potential COVID treatment. Here, we look at what some of the emerging science has had to say about it. [Ozone for Herpes? High-Dose C? What the Science Has to Say](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/iv-drip-therapy/ozone-for-herpes-high-dose-c-what-the-science-has-to-say/) A look at some of the evidence for these two natural therapies to treat herpes. [Do Any Herbal Medicines Help with Lyme Disease?](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/lyme-disease/do-any-herbal-medicines-help-with-lyme-disease/) New research suggests a number of botanical remedies may be effective against B. burgdorferi, the bacterium that causes Lyme disease. [Who Wants to Be Sick? Some Natural Immune-Boosting Options](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/iv-drip-therapy/who-wants-to-be-sick-some-natural-immune-boosting-options/) Here, we look at a range of natural options for bolstering your resilience against colds and viral diseases alike, from nutritional approaches to peptide injections to IV drip therapy and more. [The Most Transformative Thing You Can Do for Your Brain](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/wellness/the-most-transformative-thing-you-can-do-for-your-brain/) In a word? Exercise. [What Happens When You Replace Red Meat with Other Proteins? You Just Might Live Longer](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/diet-nutrition/what-happens-when-you-replace-red-meat-with-other-proteins-you-just-might-live-longer/) Research suggests that eating less red meat and getting your protein from more varied sources may support longevity. [FAQ in a Time of Coronavirus](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/integrative-medicine/faq-in-a-time-of-coronavirus/) Dr. Joe answers some of the most common questions that cropped up during the first months of the pandemic. [The Power of Positive Thinking Is No Myth](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/anti-aging/positive-thinking/) Here, we explore new research on the relationship between thought patterns and cognitive decline. [Three Dental Conditions That Can Impact Whole Body Health](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/integrative-medicine/three-dental-conditions-that-can-impact-whole-body-health/) In a follow-up to our popular [guest post on root canal teeth](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/integrative-medicine/root-canal-teeth-chronic-illness-is-there-a-connection/)and systemic illness, we look at some other dental situations that can wreak havoc on other parts of the body. [Vitamin D & Radiant Health Go Hand-in-Hand](https://holisticdoctorlosangeles.com/iv-drip-therapy/vitamin-d-radiant-health/) Vitamin D is another nutrient that's received a lot of attention in relation to COVID-19. Here, we look at some of the latest research on its other benefits to human health.
